forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Gusty winds during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 9C. Winds N at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, then partly cloudy and windy for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then scattered thunderstorms late. Low 3C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Scattered thunderstorms late. Low 37F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low around 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
